TopicTitle: kind of integrated kerbtown plugin to the game (or a building builder)

Articles.Content:
I could be great to allow people to create their own buildings on Kerbin (and on all relevant bodies, ie: not on The Star ).

I mean, as game evolve almost like an independant lifeform, and probably in every directions, some of them completely far from what dev team have ever imagined I guess, it would be great to let people creating their own buildings like runways/airports wherever we want them with the ability to give function to them, like modules for parts.

Example of module application:

fuel tank: a static deposit of fuel where we can buy/take/steal fuel with KAS winch and connector

warehouse: place to store goods, limited volume, cost for get in and out

store: where to buy/sell part, specialised like "tank-o-shop", "struct-everything", "plane mart", ...

taxi station: kerbals are waiting here and want to go there to move on Kerbin

Of course, it will not be a simkerbcity clone, but just like kerbtown plugin, integrated with the game.

It could be also a relative strong hint to see what people want by watching the most popular and best noted stuffes made by community.
why? What would it add? This is NOT SimCity 2000, ET edition.

why? What would it add? This is NOT SimCity 2000, ET edition.

That's the point, only some modding skills can allow to add buildings like the old kerbtown plugin.

After parts and vehicles, we can build, use and share buildings.

I think adding more landing strips with helpful refueling ports would be an excellent way to make aircraft/space planes even more fun. We already have the island landing strip, why not add more? A way to refuel from the KSP runway would also be great, especially when the monetary system is implemented.

Well, i'm certainly for expanding things to do with my minmus colonies but if you add shops and such, it would defeat the purpose of the game and there would be a ton of exploits. and the final blow is... kas isn't official although one of the devs said he would have a look at the mod.

Hehe.. I kinda like the idea of a shop for selling my old rockets... Can't see it ever happening. Would like to be able to create bases on all planets one day, so would be nice to at least consider this idea.

Also, selling parts make sence in roleplaying MP servers
Actually what will be good is an ability to launch in other planets, as it will make PvP servers make more sense

I'm not sure if I'd use that, but I'd love SQUAD if they added some structures like the Mun and Eve easter eggs - caves. Seriously, who WOULDN'T enjoy landing and exploring a cave on EVA or a rover? Sure, might be a little scary...but fun!

Actually what will be good is an ability to launch in other planets, as it will make PvP servers make more sense

Everyone will launch from Gilly or Dres, in this case.
I just think that a KerbTown-like plugin should be stock, but buildings would be created and added through game files, like KerbTown. Basically, something for modders to use.
The only 'building' i need is a mobile launch platform, so i can build a base on the Mun to launch rockets.
